content.question: Which of the following correctly ranks the wavelength <math alttext="lambda" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of microwaves, radio waves, and x-rays in a vacuum?

choices.label: WavelengthSpeed<math alttext="lambda sub microwave, is less than lambda sub radio, is less than lambda sub x ray" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></mstyle></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub microwave, is less than v sub radio, is less than v sub x ray" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

WavelengthSpeed<math alttext="lambda sub x ray, is less than lambda sub microwave, is less than lambda sub radio" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub x ray equals v sub microwave, equals v sub radio" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

WavelengthSpeed<math alttext="lambda sub radio, is less than lambda sub microwave, is less than lambda sub x ray" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub radio, is less than v sub microwave, less than v sub x ray" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi></mstyle><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

Wavelength Speed<math alttext="lambda sub radio equals lambda sub microwave, equals lambda sub x ray" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub radio equals v sub microwave, equals v sub x ray" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: WavelengthSpeed<math alttext="lambda sub x ray, is less than lambda sub microwave, is less than lambda sub radio" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub x ray equals v sub microwave, equals v sub radio" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>microwave</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>radio</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>
